sdata.j: ↑近代↑↓きんだい↓↑的↑↓てき↓↑方法↑↓ほうほう↓で↑産業↑↓さんぎょう↓は|↑向上|↑↓こうじょう↓した。

sdata.e: We are always aiming at improving the quality of service.

sdata.j: ↑英語↑↓えいご↓を↑話↑↓はな↓すことを|↑向上|↑↓こうじょう↓させることが、↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑留学↑↓りゅうがく↓の↑目的↑↓もくてき↓らしいね。
sdata.e: Developing his ability of speaking English, it seems, is his purpose of studying abroad.

sdata.e: Every time you read a book, you will be the better for it.

sdata.j: ↑商売↑↓しょうばい↓の↑景気↑↓けいき↓が|↑向上|↑↓こうじょう↓している。

sdata.e: The best way for adjusting the gap between the internal and the external price and securing economic growth is to promote the non-manufacturing industry's productivity by aggressive investing in facilities.
